ad_text: Notre Dame Health Care Sponsored New Year, New You, New Job Opportunities – WE’RE HIRING! 🩺✨ If you have a positive attitude, strong work ethic, and a genuine interest in improving the lives of seniors, we're looking for talent like you! We offer COMPETITIVE PAY AND BENEFITS, retirement planning, job training, resources for professional development, and more. Find your new, rewarding career in senior living today: https://www.notredamehealthcare.org/careers/ Typical Positions Include: CNAs, Licensed Nurses (RN/LPNs), Activities, Cooks, Servers, Maintenance and More. For questions, please contact Angela Lajoie, Human Resources Generalist/Recruiter at alajoie@notredamehealthcare.org or (508) 852-3011 x2513. Located in Worcester, MA. 📍 NOTREDAMEHEALTHCARE.ORG WE’RE HIRING! Rooted in the heritage of Saint Julie Billiart and sponsored by the Sisters of Notre Dame de Namur, our mission every single day is to provide exceptional care and service to give residents, families and visitors the peace of mind they need and desire.
